smartLinks.editSubtitle: It's always better to create a brand new SmartLink if any editing is needed. Except for its name â€“ you can edit it anytime.
smartLinks.createSubtitle: Creating your SmartLink choose an easy-to-remember, associative name. It will help you to manage a large number of links over time.

delete.title: Delete SmartLink
delete.subtitle: By deleting your SmartLink you also delete entire statistics logs. NOTE: the system no longer counts any clicks on this link. Take our advice: do not delete your SmartLink if you used it at least once.
delete.confirm: I am sure I want to delete this SmartLink and the entire history. I understand this operation cannot be undone.
delete.back: Go back and do not delete this SmartLink.

drawer.subtitle: Please make sure all information is correct (including your wallet address and requested amount). The transaction cannot be canceled or altered. Unfortunately, we cannot fix it if you entered the wrong wallet address.

questions.answer: Find the best affiliate offers to participate in the program. Pick a suitable offer and click the Select button. The system will redirect you to the SmartLinks section. Create your own link that will redirect traffic to the website. Feel free to use ready-made creative promo tools such as videos, images, or landing pages. You can find them any time on the Creative promo page.

SmartLink is an affiliate marketing link that drives customers to the website with a higher percentage of CR. Using your SmartLink, you don't have to create and run any complex marketing campaigns. Any user who clicks on your SmartLink will be automatically attached to your account. Also, it can be used as a detailed statistics tool as SmartLinks are related to the algorithms that provide rankings of affiliate offers due to their performance.

Get access to your detailed statistics. Track current income stats and measure your daily affiliate performance on the following page.

To make you feel comfortable with statistics, it contains five sections:

  • Clicks
  • Leads
  • Deposits
  • Profit
  • Withdraw

The section contains the following items.

  • Clicks - Total clicks
  • UC - Total unique users clicked on your link
  • EPC - Earn per one click
  • REG - Total registrations
  • CR - Clicks to registrations percentage. With 100 clicks and 10 registrations, your CR is 10%.
  • EPR - Earn per one registration
  • DEP - Total deposits made
  • CR - Conversion rate (Registration to Deposit)
  • SUM - Sum of deposits
  • CPA - Profit by CPA
  • REVSHARE - Profit by Revshare
  • SUM - Your overall profit
  • Pending - The 'Pending' status of your income under CPA (the status may remain within seven business days)
  • Declined - The 'Declined' status of your income under CPA. Make sure attracted consumers fully meet the requirements to get an 'Accepted' status
  • Accepted - The 'Accepted' status of your income under CPA

All transactions on affiliate websites are in Bitcoin (BTC). The system automatically converts BTC to USD using the current cryptocurrency exchange rate. Any amounts in fiat currencies (including USD) are indicated for information purposes only to make your experience more comfortable.

Bitcoin has always been highly volatile, and its value can rise and fall just within one month. A system calculates all prices at current BTC rates at the time of payment. Therefore your total amount may differ from the prices indicated on the website. Put it another way: the amount in BTC is still the same, but its value constantly fluctuates.

Withdraw your funds at any time in a few clicks. You can easily check your balance and create a withdrawal request in the Payments section. Your current balance state is available in the upper left corner. You also can check your entire payout history on this page.

We use the following withdrawal statuses in our system:

  • Pending. The withdrawal has been requested, and a system is processing it. The funds will be sent to your wallet within 24 hours.
  • Sent. Money successfully sent to your wallet. How long does a withdrawal take? It depends mainly on the current network load state.

contacts.title: Contact us
contacts.subTitle: We are always happy to help and advise you on any questions
contacts.secondSubTitle: Your personal manager will provide the fastest and most detailed advice on most issues
